title: Kalista
body:
When you want to play kalista but she is so booty you cant.

Help her pls

replies.body:
I used to LOVE kalista and she was my main for a few months but then they gutted her. She had the same problem that Lucian's having now where she was too good at soloing bot lane. Good damage, beautiful kiting, can dodge skillshots, and can chasedown. Too independent of her support and I guess that's not the direction they wanted for her. 

Just not a good time for her, especially since she can't abuse Duskblade, Ghostblade, or Cleaver like MF, Lucian, Ashe, Sivir, Draven, etc.

RIP in peace Kalista <3
